teams.name: Dallas_Texas
teams.loan_because: No matter how little we have, most of us have more than those in third world countries. It feels good to help.
teams.description: A wonderfully diverse group of members who share a connection through Dallas. You do not have to be a resident of Dallas or even Texas to join this group.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about the suffering of human beings.
